text: @GOP @Mike_Pence “We’re five months into this and there are still shortages of gowns, hair covers, shoe covers, masks, N95 masks,” said Deborah Burger, president of National Nurses United — Coronavirus: U.S. sees new shortage of PPE as cases, hospitalizations climb https://t.co/HUx06z86fq
